definitions.definition: a set of two things used together or regarded as a unit.
synonyms: two of a kind "a pair of gloves"

definitions.definition: an article or object consisting of two joined or corresponding parts not used separately.
two playing cards of the same denomination.
examples: I have a pair of jacks

definitions.definition: two people related in some way or considered together.
examples: a company run by a pair of brothers

definitions.definition: the second member of a pair in relation to the first.
examples: each course member tries to persuade his pair of the merits of his model

definitions.definition: two horses harnessed side by side.
either or both of two members of a legislative assembly on opposite sides who absent themselves from voting by mutual arrangement, leaving the relative position of the parties unaffected.
join or connect to form a pair.
examples: a cardigan paired with a matching skirt
synonyms: twin "a cardigan paired with a matching skirt"

examples: they bought a rooster to pair with the hen
Rachel has paired up with Tommy

definitions.definition: give (a member of a legislative assembly) another member as a pair, to allow both to absent themselves from a vote without affecting the result.
examples: an absent member on one side is to be paired with an absentee on the other
